title: Ship Ahoy Indie Media MVP (Web)
description: Stabilize the Flask app, fix Render deploy, and ship a public MVP with auth, playlists/bookmarks, and a working Watchlist.

title: Unity/Xbox Front-End: Grid Library + Watchlist
description: Parse the public JSON endpoint in Unity, finish the 3x grid layout, smooth scrolling, and add the Watchlist toggle.

title: Close 2 After-School Teaching Contracts (Fall/Winter, Greater New Haven)
description: Pitch libraries, YMCAs, Boys & Girls Club, and Parks & Rec; finalize scope, dates, and rates for two paid programs.

title: Package 4 Ready-to-Run Curricula
description: AI Art & Creative Coding, Unreal World Building (no VR), Podcasting + Storytelling, Front-End Design & Full-Stack. Each with syllabus, supply list, and 5-session lesson plans.

title: LifeOS Static Site
description: Keep a single static site (Programs, Bookmarks, Goals) where JSON is edited manually in Cursor; no backend or CRUD.

title: Scoutalina (RouteScout) Android Alpha
description: Stabilize the GitHub Actions Buildozer workflow, produce a downloadable APK, and log on-the-road land leads.

title: CPC Admin Portal: JSON Export & Content CRUD
description: Finish the CPC New Haven admin panel to manage podcast series, sermons, adult classes, event highlights; enable per-group JSON export for the static front-end.

title: CPC Retreat Media Gallery
description: Publish a static gallery from Google Drive photos to GitHub Pages with lightweight indexing and captions.

title: Creatures in the Tall Grass — Act I + Test Shoots
description: Lock Act I outline and run stabilization/handheld walk tests with RED Komodo + Sirui anamorphic; confirm Resolve pipeline.

title: Zuki (Raspberry Pi 5) Personal Robot MVP
description: Bring up a minimal Python app with chat, voice IO, and a cute character UI inside the Snorlax shell.

title: Income Floor ≥ $5k/month
description: Mix retainer(s), teaching, tutoring, and small freelance to reliably cover $3.5k expenses and save the rest.

title: Fund Ally Buckets (Emergency, Land, Planned Purchases, Build Wealth)
description: Automate transfers and track balances monthly against targets.

title: HR-V Maintenance for Resale Value
description: Replace battery and address inner-rim rust from shoreline exposure; document work for future sale.

title: Little Market: Pop-Up + Shopify Theme
description: Test a monthly pop-up with jam/pickle labels; ship the minimalist Japanese-inspired Shopify theme.
